thread.title: For Smart Cities Like Miami, Streetlights Are Just the Beginning

title: For Smart Cities Like Miami, Streetlights Are Just the Beginning
text:
29 For Smart Cities Like Miami, Streetlights Are Just the Beginning 
Government Executive: The largest electric utility in the Sunshine State is empowering budding smart cities like Miami with networked streetlights, 500,000 of them across 35 counties in southern Florida, establishing a canopy under which to add future applications.
